mapper.select: select level, articleNO, parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || title title, content, writeDate, id from board start with parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, id) values(seq_board.nextval, 0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{id})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where articleNO=#{articleNO}
